issues.title: {{PROJECT_NAME}} Initial Setup
issues.description: Complete TypeScript project setup with npm, testing, and linting.

issues.title: Initialize npm project
issues.description:
Set up npm project:
- Run `npm install` to install dependencies
- Verify Node.js version >= 18
- Confirm package.json is correct
- Test that `npm run build` works

issues.title: Create TypeScript source structure
issues.description:
Create standard TypeScript layout:
- src/index.ts (main entry point)
- src/lib/ (library code)
- tests/ (test files)
- Verify tsconfig.json paths are correct

issues.title: Configure Vitest testing
issues.description:
Set up Vitest for testing:
- Create vitest.config.ts if needed
- Create first test in tests/index.test.ts
- Run `npm test` and confirm it passes
- Configure coverage reporting

issues.title: Configure ESLint and Prettier
issues.description:
Set up code quality tools:
- Create .eslintrc.json with TypeScript rules
- Create .prettierrc for formatting
- Run `npm run lint` and fix any issues
- Add editor config for consistency

issues.title: Configure GitHub Actions CI
issues.description:
Set up continuous integration:
- Create .github/workflows/ci.yml
- Run build, test, and lint on push/PR
- Test on Node.js 18, 20, 22
- Add status badge to README

issues.title: Implement first working feature
issues.description:
Build the first functional feature:
- Implement core functionality in src/
- Export from src/index.ts
- Write tests for the feature
- Ensure build and tests pass
